import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ProductConstructor.css'; // import FileUploader from './FileUploader'; function ProductConstructor() { const [productName, setProductName] = useState(''); const [productDescription, setProductDescription] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); const [color, setColor] = useState([]); const [length, setLength] = useState(''); const [weight, setWeight] = useState(''); const [stoneOrigin, setStoneOrigin] = useState(''); const [metalType, setMetalType] = useState(''); const [stoneSize, setStoneSize] = useState(''); const [production, setProduction] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [salePrice, setSalePrice] = useState(''); const [discount, setDiscount] = useState(0); const [articleNumber, setArticleNumber] = useState(''); const [inStock, setInStock] = useState(''); const [buttonColor, setButtonColor] = useState(''); // const [stoneColor, setStoneColor] = useState([]); const [additionalProperties, setAdditionalProperties] = useState([]); // const [favorite, setFavorite] = useState(false); // const [status, setStatus] = useState('draft'); const [radioValue, setRadioValue] = useState(''); const [attachedFiles, setAttachedFiles] = useState([]); const [isUnique, setIsUnique] = useState(0); const [isIrid, setIsIrid] = useState(0); const [isMinimalism, setIsMinimalism] = useState(0); const [isMasterpiece, setIsMasterpiece] = useState(0); const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; function handleDrop(e) { e.preventDefault(); const files = [...e.dataTransfer.files]; setAttachedFiles([...attachedFiles, ...files]); }; function handleFileInputChange(e) { const files = [...e.target.files]; setAttachedFiles([...attachedFiles, ...files]); }; function handleAttachButtonClick() { document.getElementById('fileInput').click(); }; function handleCategoryChange(e) { setCategory(e.target.value); // они будут просто переключаться, разобраться } function handleColorChange(e) { setColor(e.target.value); } return (
{/*

Добавление и редактирование товара

*/}
setProductName(e.target.value)} />
